|blank1_info = 1267614 |website = https://www.viborgsd.org/ |footnotes = }} Viborg is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Turner County, and 814 people lived there at the 2020 census. Viborg became a city in 1903. == References == == Other websites == *City of Viborg website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1903 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in South Dakota
